                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.cuti-sakit.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                @include('laporan.modal.modal-cuti-sakit')
                    <tr>
                       <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.cuti-sakit.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.cuti-sakit.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                    
                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
         <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

</code>

resources/views/laporan/imunisasi.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Imunisasi</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.imunisasi.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.imunisasi.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.imunisasi.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label>
                    <select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}">{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label>
                    <select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)
                            <option value="{{ $t }}">{{ $t }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <table class="table table-bordered">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Subkategori</th>
                        <th>Jumlah</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    @foreach ($subkategori as $sub)
                        <tr>
                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.imunisasi.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-imunisasi')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.imunisasi.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.imunisasi.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

</code>

resources/views/laporan/kategori-khusus.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Kategori Khusus</h3>

        {{-- Flash Success --}}
        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        {{-- Form Tambah --}}
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.kategori-khusus.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row g-3 align-items-end">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="subkategori_id" class="form-label">Subkategori</label>
                    <select name="subkategori_id" id="subkategori_id" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Subkategori --</option>
                        @foreach ($subkategoris as $sub)
                            <option value="{{ $sub->id }}" {{ old('subkategori_id') == $sub->id ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $sub->nama }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>

                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="nama" class="form-label">Nama Pekerja</label>
                    <input type="text" name="nama" class="form-control" required>
                </div>

                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="status" class="form-label">Status</label>
                    <select name="status" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Status --</option>
                        <option value="Pekerja Tetap">Pekerja Tetap</option>
                        <option value="PKWT">PKWT</option>
                        <option value="Honor">Honor</option>
                        <option value="OS">OS</option>
                    </select>
                </div>

                <div class="col-md-3" id="jenisDisabilitasGroup" style="display: none;">
                    <label class="form-label">Jenis Disabilitas</label>
                    <select name="jenis_disabilitas" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Jenis --</option>
                        <option value="Fisik">Fisik</option>
                        <option value="Intelektual">Intelektual</option>
                        <option value="Sensorik">Sensorik</option>
                        <option value="Mental">Mental</option>
                    </select>
                </div>

                <div class="col-md-3" id="keteranganGroup" style="display: none;">
                    <label class="form-label">Keterangan</label>
                    <input type="text" name="keterangan" class="form-control">
                </div>

                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary mt-3">Simpan</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Filter dan Tabel Data --}}
        <hr class="my-4">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <label for="filter" class="form-label">Filter Subkategori</label>
            <select name="filter" class="form-select w-25 d-inline" onchange="this.form.submit()">
                <option value="">Semua</option>
                @foreach ($subkategoris as $sub)
                    <option value="{{ $sub->id }}" {{ request('filter') == $sub->id ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                        {{ $sub->nama }}
                    </option>
                @endforeach
            </select>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Nama</th>
                    <th>Status</th>
                    <th>Jenis Disabilitas</th>
                    <th>Keterangan</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse ($data as $i => $item)
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $i + 1 }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $item->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $item->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $item->status }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $item->jenis_disabilitas ?? '-' }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $item->keterangan ?? '-' }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning" data-bs-toggle="modal"
                                data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $item->id }}">Edit</button>

                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.kategori-khusus.destroy', $item->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin hapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                    {{-- Fitur Modal --}}
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-kategori-khusus', [
                        'item' => $item,
                        'subkategoris' => $subkategoris,
                    ])


                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
    </div>

    {{-- Script Dinamis --}}
    <script>
        const subSelect = document.getElementById('subkategori_id');
        const jenisGroup = document.getElementById('jenisDisabilitasGroup');
        const ketGroup = document.getElementById('keteranganGroup');

        function toggleCreateFields() {
            const val = parseInt(subSelect.value);
            jenisGroup.style.display = (val === 82) ? 'block' : 'none';
            ketGroup.style.display = [82, 83, 84, 85].includes(val) ? 'block' : 'none';
        }

        subSelect.addEventListener('change', toggleCreateFields);
        window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', toggleCreateFields);

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            document.querySelectorAll('.edit-subkategori').forEach(select => {
                const id = select.dataset.id;
                const jenisGroup = document.querySelector(`.jenis-disabilitas-group-${id}`);
                const ketGroup = document.querySelector(`.keterangan-group-${id}`);

                function toggleEditFields() {
                    const val = parseInt(select.value);
                    jenisGroup.style.display = (val === 82) ? 'block' : 'none';
                    ketGroup.style.display = [82, 83, 84, 85].includes(val) ? 'block' : 'none';
                }

                toggleEditFields(); // initial
                select.addEventListener('change', toggleEditFields);
            });
        });
    </script>
@endsection
</code>

resources/views/laporan/kecelakaan-kerja.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Kecelakaan Kerja</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.kecelakaan-kerja.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.kecelakaan-kerja.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.kecelakaan-kerja.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label>
                    <select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}">{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label>
                    <select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)
                            <option value="{{ $t }}">{{ $t }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <table class="table table-bordered">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Subkategori</th>
                        <th>Jumlah</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    @foreach ($subkategori as $sub)
                        <tr>
                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.kecelakaan-kerja.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-kecelakaan-kerja')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.kecelakaan-kerja.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.kecelakaan-kerja.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Kehamilan</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">

                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.kehamilan.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>

                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->

            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">

                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)

                    </tr>
                </thead>

                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>

                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach

        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.kehamilan.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-kehamilan')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.kehamilan.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.kehamilan.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"

                                @csrf

                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

resources/views/laporan/kematian.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Kematian</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.kematian.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.kematian.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.kematian.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label>
                    <select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}">{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label>
                    <select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)
                            <option value="{{ $t }}">{{ $t }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <table class="table table-bordered">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Subkategori</th>
                        <th>Jumlah</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    @foreach ($subkategori as $sub)
                        <tr>
                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.kematian.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-kematian')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.kematian.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.kematian.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

</code>

resources/views/laporan/kependudukan.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
<div class="container mt-4">
    <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Kependudukan</h3>

    @if (session('success'))<div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">{{ session('success') }}<button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert"></button></div>@endif
    @if (session('error'))<div class="alert alert-danger alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">{{ session('error') }}<button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert"></button></div>@endif

    <div class="card mb-4">
        <div class="card-header fw-bold">Input Laporan Bulanan</div>
        <div class="card-body">
            <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.kependudukan.store') }}">
                @csrf
                <fieldset id="input-form">
                    <div class="row mb-3">
                        <div class="col-md-3"><label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label><select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>@foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)<option value="{{ $b }}" {{ old('bulan', date('n')) == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}</option>@endforeach</select></div>
                        <div class="col-md-3"><label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label><select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>@for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)<option value="{{ $t }}" {{ old('tahun', date('Y')) == $t ? 'selected' : '' }}>{{ $t }}</option>@endfor</select></div>
                    </div>
                    <div id="approval-status-alert" class="alert alert-warning" style="display: none;">Data untuk periode ini sudah disetujui dan tidak dapat diubah.</div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered">
                        <thead><tr><th>Subkategori</th><th>Jumlah</th></tr></thead>
                        <tbody>@foreach ($subkategori as $sub)<tr><td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td><td><input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control" min="0" value="0" required></td></tr>@endforeach</tbody>
                    </table>
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
                </fieldset>
            </form>
        </div>
    </div>

    <hr class="my-5">
    <h5 class="fw-bold">Data Tersimpan</h5>

    <table class="table table-striped">
        <thead><tr><th>No</th><th>Subkategori</th><th>Jumlah</th><th>Bulan</th><th>Tahun</th><th>Aksi</th></tr></thead>
        <tbody>
            @forelse($data as $i => $row)
            @php
                $isApproved = isset($approvals[Auth::user()->unit_id . '-' . $row->bulan . '-' . $row->tahun]);
            @endphp
            <tr>
                <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                <td>
                    @if(!$isApproved)
                        <a href="#" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">Edit</a>
                    @else
                        <span class="badge bg-success">Telah Disetujui</span>
                    @endif
                </td>
            </tr>
            @if(!$isApproved)
              @include('laporan.modal.modal-kependudukan')
            @endif
            @empty
            <tr><td colspan="6" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td></tr>
            @endforelse
        </tbody>
    </table>
    <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">{{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}</div>
</div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    const bulanSelect = document.getElementById('bulan');
    const tahunSelect = document.getElementById('tahun');
    const formFieldset = document.getElementById('input-form');
    const statusAlert = document.getElementById('approval-status-alert');
    const approvals = @json($approvals);
    const unitId = {{ Auth::user()->unit_id }};

    function checkApprovalStatus() {
        const bulan = bulanSelect.value;
        const tahun = tahunSelect.value;
        const key = `${unitId}-${bulan}-${tahun}`;

        if (approvals[key]) {
            formFieldset.disabled = true;
            statusAlert.style.display = 'block';
        } else {
            formFieldset.disabled = false;
            statusAlert.style.display = 'none';
        }
    }
    bulanSelect.addEventListener('change', checkApprovalStatus);
    tahunSelect.addEventListener('change', checkApprovalStatus);
    checkApprovalStatus();
});
</script>
@endsection
</code>

resources/views/laporan/klaim-asuransi.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Klaim Asuransi</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.klaim-asuransi.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.klaim-asuransi.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.klaim-asuransi.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label>
                    <select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}">{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label>
                    <select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)
                            <option value="{{ $t }}">{{ $t }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <table class="table table-bordered">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Subkategori</th>
                        <th>Jumlah</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    @foreach ($subkategori as $sub)
                        <tr>
                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.klaim-asuransi.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-klaim-asuransi')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.klaim-asuransi.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.klaim-asuransi.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>

                @endforelse

        </table>

                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)

                        @endfor
                    </select>

                </div>
            </div>

                    <th>No</th>

                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>

                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-konsultasi-klinik')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.konsultasi-klinik.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.konsultasi-klinik.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"

                                @method('DELETE')

                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>

resources/views/laporan/metode-kb.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Metode KB</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.metode-kb.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.metode-kb.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.metode-kb.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label>
                    <select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}">{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label>
                    <select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)
                            <option value="{{ $t }}">{{ $t }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <table class="table table-bordered">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Subkategori</th>
                        <th>Jumlah</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    @foreach ($subkategori as $sub)
                        <tr>
                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.metode-kb.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-metode-kb')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.metode-kb.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.metode-kb.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

</code>

resources/views/laporan/opname.blade.php:
<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Opname</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.opname.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.opname.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.opname.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label>
                    <select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}">{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label>
                    <select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)
                            <option value="{{ $t }}">{{ $t }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <table class="table table-bordered">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Subkategori</th>
                        <th>Jumlah</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    @foreach ($subkategori as $sub)
                        <tr>
                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.opname.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-opname')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.opname.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.opname.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

</code>

                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach

                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">

                </div>
            </div>

                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>

                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>

                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>

                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.penyakit.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"

        </div>

<code>
@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Peserta KB</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.peserta-kb.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.peserta-kb.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.peserta-kb.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="bulan" class="form-label">Bulan</label>
                    <select name="bulan" id="bulan" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}">{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $b)->format('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <label for="tahun" class="form-label">Tahun</label>
                    <select name="tahun" id="tahun" class="form-select" required>
                        <option value="">-- Pilih Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($t = date('Y'); $t >= 2020; $t--)
                            <option value="{{ $t }}">{{ $t }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <table class="table table-bordered">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Subkategori</th>
                        <th>Jumlah</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    @foreach ($subkategori as $sub)
                        <tr>
                            <td>{{ $sub->nama }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <input type="number" name="jumlah[{{ $sub->id }}]" class="form-control"
                                    min="0" required>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Simpan</button>
        </form>

        <!-- Tabel Data yang Sudah Diinputkan -->
        <hr class="my-5">
        <h5>Data Tersimpan</h5>

        {{-- Fitur Search --}}
        <form method="GET" action="{{ route('laporan.peserta-kb.index') }}" class="row g-3 mb-3">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <input type="text" name="search" class="form-control" placeholder="Cari Subkategori"
                    value="{{ request('search') }}">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Cari</button>
            </div>
        </form>

        {{-- Fitur Filter --}}
        <form method="GET" class="mb-3">
            <div class="row g-2">
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="bulan" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Bulan --</option>
                        @foreach (range(1, 12) as $b)
                            <option value="{{ $b }}" {{ request('bulan') == $b ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ \Carbon\Carbon::create()->month($b)->translatedFormat('F') }}
                            </option>
                        @endforeach
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-3">
                    <select name="tahun" class="form-select">
                        <option value="">-- Filter Tahun --</option>
                        @for ($y = date('Y'); $y >= 2020; $y--)
                            <option value="{{ $y }}" {{ request('tahun') == $y ? 'selected' : '' }}>
                                {{ $y }}</option>
                        @endfor
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-2">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Filter</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>

        <table class="table table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>No</th>
                    <th>Subkategori</th>
                    <th>Jumlah</th>
                    <th>Bulan</th>
                    <th>Tahun</th>
                    <th>Unit</th>
                    <th>Aksi</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @forelse($data as $i => $row)
                    @include('laporan.modal.modal-peserta-kb')
                    <tr>
                        <td>{{ $data->firstItem() + $i }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->subkategori->nama }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->jumlah }}</td>
                        <td>{{ DateTime::createFromFormat('!m', $row->bulan)->format('F') }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->tahun }}</td>
                        <td>{{ $row->unit->nama }}</td>
                        <td>
                            <a href="{{ route('laporan.peserta-kb.edit', $row->id) }}" class="btn btn-sm btn-warning"
                                data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#editModal{{ $row->id }}">
                                Edit
                            </a>
                            {{-- <form action="{{ route('laporan.peserta-kb.destroy', $row->id) }}" method="POST"
                                class="d-inline" onsubmit="return confirm('Yakin ingin menghapus data ini?')">
                                @csrf
                                @method('DELETE')
                                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger">Hapus</button>
                            </form> --}}
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                @empty
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Belum ada data</td>
                    </tr>
                @endforelse
            </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3">
            {{ $data->links('pagination::bootstrap-5') }}
        </div>
    </div>
@endsection

</code>

@extends('layout.app')

@section('content')
    <div class="container mt-4">
        <h3 class="mb-4">Laporan Sakit Berkepanjangan</h3>

        @if (session('success'))
            <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
                {{ session('success') }}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close"></button>
            </div>
        @endif

        <!-- Form Edit Jumlah -->
        @isset($editItem)
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">Edit Jumlah untuk Subkategori: <strong>{{ $editItem->subkategori->nama }}</strong></div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.sakit-berkepanjangan.update', $editItem->id) }}">
                        @csrf
                        @method('PUT')

                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="jumlah" class="form-label">Jumlah</label>
                            <input type="number" name="jumlah" class="form-control" value="{{ $editItem->jumlah }}" required>
                        </div>

                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update</button>
                        <a href="{{ route('laporan.sakit-berkepanjangan.index') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Batal</a>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        @endisset

        <!-- Form Input Laporan -->
        <form method="POST" action="{{ route('laporan.sakit-berkepanjangan.store') }}">
            @csrf
            <div class="row mb-3">

                <form action="{{ route('laporan.absensi-dokter-honorer.update', $row->id) }}" method="POST">
                    @csrf

                    <div class="modal-header">
                        <h5 class="modal-title" id="editModalLabel{{ $row->id }}">Edit Laporan</h5>
